body_html: I think it's not easy to introduce new APIs for TF 1.0 now. Any new API will have to go through a design review, and I don't feel like doing that. On the other hand, we could just add a property to the VariableScope object that would select all variables. That's a very small API change, I think. But I'll wait for Martin to comment more, he knows way more about the API process.
